text: Dante's Inferno is a 1935 American drama movie directed by Harry Lachman and was based on the 14th century poem Divine Comedy by Dante Alighieri. It stars Spencer Tracy, Claire Trevor, Henry B. Walthall, Alan Dinehart, Rita Hayworth, Don Ameche, Willard Robertson, Scotty Beckett and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1935 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Harry Lachman
title: Dante's Inferno (1935 movie)
